original_text: Most of the people who came from the tribes of Ephraim, Manasseh, Issachar and Zebulun had not made themselves properly clean. They should not have eaten the Passover meal, because God's law said that was wrong. But they still ate the meal. So Hezekiah prayed for them. He said, ‘ Lord you are good. Please forgive everyone 19 who really wants to obey you, the God of their ancestors. If they have not made themselves properly clean to eat this meal, please forgive them.’
korean_text: 에브라임과 므낫세와 잇사갈과 스불론의 많은 무리는 자기들을 깨끗하게 하지 아니하고 유월절 양을 먹어 기록한 규례를 어긴지라 히스기야가 그들을 위하여 기도하여 이르되 선하신 여호와여 사하옵소서
